mapper.insert: insert into w_shopcart (shopcart_id, shopcart_user_id, shopcart_spu_id, shopcart_shop_number) values (#{shopcartId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopcartUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopcartSpuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopcartShopNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER})
